import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    t = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
    s = t * (k // n)
    s += t[:k % n]
    print(s)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()

    s = t * (k // n) + t[:k % n]

    print(s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()

    s = t * (k // n) + t[:k % n]
    print(s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    """
    This is the main function
    """
    n, k = input().split()
    n = int(n)
    k = int(k)
    string = input()
    if k == 1:
        print(string)
    else:
        print(string*k)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    s = t * (k // n)
    s += t[:k % n]
    print(s)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
